entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
